Key Match Events: France came from behind to win 3-2 against Chile
Randal Kolo Muani scored one goal and assisted another
Youssouf Fofana equalized for France with a deflected effort
Post-Match Reflections: Didier Deschamps' side responded fairly well after a sluggish start
Kolo Muani's display will give Deschamps food for thought ahead of Euro 2024
Miscellaneous Highlights: Eduardo Vargas inexplicably hit the post with a free header from close-range
Dario Osorio scored a stunning effort from long-range for Chile
Others: Kylian Mbappe had a disappointing outing, missing several close-range shots
